title: Of the 67.8k damage yasuo did, 18.6k was true damage.
body: Now please tell me why I should be building armour again? This is the reason why tanks are so awful to play for the past year.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Klepto annie,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=MwplWQAT,comment-id=,timestamp=2019-02-12T03:56:01.842+0000)
>
> Now please tell me why I should be building armour again? This is the reason why tanks are so awful to play for the past year.

For the 39.7k physical damage he did (9.4k was magic damage).

https://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2975815713/211103400?tab=stats

Note that your team had Garen with Randuin's, Thornmail, Tabi, and Chain Vest; Sej (you) with Randuin's and Tabi; and Leona with Dead Man's Plate and Thornmail. Kai'Sa even got Zhonya's and Guardian Angel. That is a very armor-heavy team, which is why true damage (probably from Conqueror, a common keystone for Yasuo) had such an opportunity to shine.

Also note that this was a 39-minute match, and both teams were extremely evenly matched in kills (48-49), gold (76k-77k), and objectives (only difference was Rift Herald).

I don't really see a problem here.
Yup. Can't play tanks right now.

Wait how the hell? Yasuo is averaging like 3k true damage a game, how the hell did he do 18k? You should probably send a support ticket, that sounds like a huge bug.

Yasuo has many problems but his true damage isn’t one of them.

He still has the bug where if he dives you when he has passive shield up, you damage his shield or cc him, yet it counts as executed instead of kill.

Damaging a shield has never counted as an assist, on any champion, as long as the damage does not break the shield.

As for CC, that should be granting kill credit. I highly doubt that it isn't.
It could follow the same rule.  if the CC ability doesn't break the shield, it would essentially act as if  you didn't damage the champ

Would not account for the numbers shown, especially with yasuo's armor pen. Yasuo deals a ton of damage but most of it should be physical, dealing that much true damage with the current mechanical in place is likely a bug.

true damage doesn't get reduced but physical damage does

if you multiply the damage by 2 to account for armor,  it's over 10% but not the 15% that this is

if this is total damage to all, it would account for minions as well
yasuo has always been a tank shredder with or without conqueror.
